page.title: 19BMX & Football - Shawforth
page.content: There are lots of places in Shawforth where you can go on your bike and ride a trials track. Sometimes we make jumps on a stretch of ground called the orange track. This is the site where the old railway line used to run and it gets its name from the colour of the soil. The track is used during Whitworth Sports Festival for a BMX trial and people from all over our area take part. Lots of people around here have BMX bikes. Primary schools in this area play Seven-a-Side Football in leagues and Five-a-Side Football in tournaments. Schools are put into leagues based on the number of boys there are in the juniors, and their geographical location. With schools being spread over a wide area you might have to travel many miles to play matches.
